v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy holy head, once bound with thorns, The crown of glory now adorns, Thy seat, the Father's throne: O Lord, e'en now we sing Thy praise, Ours the eternal song to raise, Worthy the Lord alone.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As Head for us Thou sittest there, Thy members here the blessing share, Of all Thou dost receive: Thy wisdom, riches, honours, powers, Thy boundless love has all made ours, Who in Thy name believe.{/lang-eng}
